sec.div: 3.2. The Effect of the EOM on Time to Swim to Exhaustion of Rat
sec.p: Figure 1 shows that the time to swim to exhaustion for the fatigue group was shorter than that for the control group ( P < 0.05). However, the time to swim to exhaustion of the EOM group was significantly longer than for the other three groups ( P < 0.05 or P < 0.01).
